Reviews.Title: Good camera but I was expecting a 4pack
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: When I received and opened the package, I was wandering where the other three cameras are. I went back online to review my order. I realized that I had only ordered 1 camera. The picture displaying the camera can be deceiving since it has 4 cameras in the photo (I wanted to order a 4-pack to add to my existing system). I will pay better attention to the description next time. As for the camera, It has a clear and sharp picture, it seems to be built well, and it does what it should. Now, back to Amazon to find a 3-pack.
